item.title: Shark attacks dropped in 2024. Here's where most bites occurred.
item.description: The number of shark attacks, including deadly bites, dropped substantially worldwide in 2024, according to a new report.

item.title: Several brands of canned tuna recalled due to botulism risk
item.description: Several brands of canned tuna sold at stores like Trader Joe's, Publix and Costco have been voluntarily recalled due to a risk of botulism. No illness...

item.title: House Republicans release budget plan, with trillions in tax and spending cuts
item.description: House Republicans released a budget resolution on Wednesday, laying a foundation for approving President Trump's agenda.

item.title: Home insurance explained: Everything homeowners need to know
item.description: Learning the basics of home insurance now can make it easier to ensure that your home is fully protected.
